law.text: The Personnel Cabinet shall promulgate administrative regulations necessary for the administration of the state employee workers' compensation fund established by KRS 18A.375, the actuarial soundness of the fund, the integrity of the fund, the purchase of reinsurance or excess insurance, and the expenditure of moneys from the fund.
law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 154, sec. 53, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 490, sec. 3, effective July 13, 1990.
